metadata.title: CVE-2023-1906 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow issue was discovered in ImageMagick'sImportMultiSpectralQuantum() function in MagickCore/quantum-import.c. Anattacker could pass specially crafted file to convert, triggering anout-of-bounds read error, allowing an application to crash, resulting in adenial of service.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
